taskDescription: The sun, Venus, and Jupiter all line up on a given day. Venus orbits the sun once every 255 days. Jupiter orbits the sun every 4,330 days (weâ€™ll ignore the decimal values of days for each orbit). How many days will it be until they line up again?
detailedSolution: The sun, Venus, and Jupiter will line up again in 220,830 days.
